divs: sighting details7: 25 est 1\19\13 in front of house sitting on the porch enjoying the weather, when i noticed a red orb flashing and then it blinked out and 3 appeared, it flew over my neighbors house in a boomerang shape, went over my right side of my driveway, over the trees. i heard my neighbor come outside, i ran to the side of my yard, yelled at him and he saw them. they were headed ne and then they turned and went w and a new orb joined them and it was flashing white and red. after that, heard a few military planes about 5 minutes later heading s over my neighbors house. i did try to tape it on video, but my camera could not focus for some reason.. =( i will submit the video when i look at it.
Summary: Red Orbs flying in a boomerang fashion
